extendedInfo.description: Whether it is to call the waiter in a restaurant or annoy your colleagues during meetings, install this fun application on your phone to draw attention.Features: - Different sounds (long bell, a gong and a cowbell!)  - Internet for update checkingNew: cupcake release.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works well in the classroom. Wonderful help for busy teachers who have a vital piece of equipment always at their fingertips. Range of sounds extends its usefulness. The Chinese language teacher loves the gong.
reviews.author: David Tyler

reviews.comment: Dumb. Doesn\'t even sound like a real desk bell. This has nothing to do with travel, so get it out of that section.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cann realy wind people up with is tolay fake tones. Other than that minor amusments totaly usless ! xx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just wish the short ding was less short
reviews.comment: Love the animation and the sounds! Great app, but I wish the short ding sound lasted longer to be more realistic. It\'s the closest to the sound I want
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: should include the widget+doesn\'t work during calls on Droid. it just beeps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Funny and can\'t wait to try on someone who isn\'t at front desk.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be a fun app if this wouldn\'t require internet. Sorry for my privacy concernes with an app of a sound and an image requiering inet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Girlfriend hates it, which means I love it. If your goal is to be annoying then you will enjoy this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ding. Ding. Honey, i need a beer! She doesnt always bring one, but thats not the apps fault! Fun app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My daughter used it when she was ill to call me whenever she needded anything. Got really useless so i uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tragic amount of delay. Good clear sound. Speed up response for 5 star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well on my G1. It\'s a bell and it works. Great way to get people to notice you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its ok not %100 accurate but really make noise and call someone atention...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ok i guess. Too slow with delayed reaction time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am always looking for fun apps for my kids. My 3 kids love it and i dont even know why i love it, but i do! DING!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool but i got the widget. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too gong-like not like real thing, fix sound its perfect but for what?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very efficient simple application. However I will never use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its ok not that great withcow bell andthe gong totally unrealistic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I used the bell to get somebodys attention abt 30ft away at walmart deli and it WORKED! Good job! ..MOTOROLA DROID..
